welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Rosa, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Morro do Portugues
restaurants.description: Morro do Portugues is a restaurant located in Santa Rosa do Sul.
restaurants.address: BR 101 Km 447, Santa Rosa Do Sul, SC

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal is primarily used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal serves only domestic flights operated by smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
